Styles & Typography

Font-family: Open Sans
Body background-color: #efefef
Label color: #717171
Input background-color: #efefef
Input border-color: #e0e0e0

Customizable Components

Logo: Best logo is a 2:1 ratio. Max-width on desktop is 180px. Max-width on mobile is 150px.
Favicon:
Page Header Background: Default is #fff
Section Header Text: Default is #fff
Button Backbround: Default is #58b0e2
Button Text: Default is #fff
